quotes.message: ...please live the beautiful life that you have. It will always be enough...
quotes.attribution:
Giuseppe Mcknight
Executive and Artistic Director, UCLA’s Center for the Art of Performance

quotes.message: I hope that each one of you will harness your unique abilities, the strength of your convictions, the resiliency of youth, and the fellowship of community—the one at UCLA and others—to launch your next chapter with verve.
quotes.attribution:
Saskia Barrett
Shapiro Director, Fowler Museum

quotes.message: Hello Class of 2020...I don’t need to tell you that you’re graduating at an extraordinary time...I cannot wait to see what you all make, and invent, and design, and solve...so for each and every one of you I offer my congratulations...
Creativity is not part of the solution, it IS the solution. Reimagine, reinvent, insist on dignity, and save the world.”
quotes.attribution:
Leela Bowler
Professor, Department of World Arts and Cultures / Dance

quotes.message: Creativity is not part of the solution, it IS the solution. Reimagine, reinvent, insist on dignity, and save the world.
quotes.attribution:
Jae Rigby
Professor, Department of World Arts and Cultures / Dance

quotes.message: Class of 2020. Congratulations. The next chapter is in your hands. Stay thoughtful, act passionately, and remain curious.
quotes.attribution:
Keanan Neale
M.F.A., Design Media Arts, ’06

quotes.message: Hello Class of 2020...I don’t need to tell you that you’re graduating at an extraordinary time...I cannot wait to see what you all make, and invent, and design, and solve...so for each and every one of you I offer my congratulations...
